params.taskDescription:
A euchre hand contains 5 cards. How many ways are there to receive a 5-card hand (where the order in which the cards are received matters, i.e., 9<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♡<!-- ♡ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\heartsuit</annotation></semantics></math>, J<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♡<!-- ♡ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\heartsuit</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>K</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♣<!-- ♣ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\text{K}}\clubsuit </annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>9</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♠<!-- ♠ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">9\spadesuit </annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>10</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♠<!-- ♠ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">10\spadesuit </annotation></semantics></math> is different from  <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>9</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♠<!-- ♠ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">9\spadesuit </annotation></semantics></math> J<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♡<!-- ♡ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\heartsuit</annotation></semantics></math>, 9<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♡<!-- ♡ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\heartsuit</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>K</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♣<!-- ♣ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\text{K}}\clubsuit </annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>10</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♠<!-- ♠ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">10\spadesuit </annotation></semantics></math>?

params.taskDescription: After all 4 players get their hands, the remaining 4 cards are placed facedown in the center of the table. How many arrangements of 4 cards are there from this deck?

params.taskDescription: How many different arrangements of the full euchre deck are possible (i.e., how many different shuffles are there)?

questionSetStimulus: The following exercises are about the card game euchre, which uses a partial standard deck of cards: It only has the cards with ranks 9, 10, J, Q, K, and A for a total of 24 cards. Some variations of the game use the 8s or the 7s and 8s, but we’ll stick with the 24-card version.
